articles.title: Watch: Candid moments from G20 Leaders' Summit in New Delhi as PM Modi meets world leaders - Times of India
articles.description: The G20 Summit held on September 9-10 was a resounding success with unanimous agreement on Delhi Declaration and the inclusion of African Union as a member of the grouping. The summit also gave world leaders time to interact with one another away fro
